name: Apoli II Dining Table
description: The Apoli II dining table by Kifu Paris is both dramatic and organic in its unique design. The black pen shell inlaid top sits on a long clustered geometric and sculptural bronze-patina brass base. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. Part of the Apoli Capsule Series. Custom color/sizing available on request. All pieces are handmade by artisans, making each unique.
